languages.text: "И место неприятное. Это основание шпиля, на котором мы обитаем. Комморра сшита из лоскутов разных измерений, и в том месте эти лоскуты начали рваться. Пространство коллапсирует, энтропийная радиация зашкаливает, плодятся всякие чудовища, а сам сектор потихоньку обращается в ничто..."

"It's an off-putting place. It's the base of the spire in which we live. Commorragh is stitched together from scraps of various dimensions, and in the Mangled Sector, the seams are starting to rip. Space is collapsing in on itself and entropic radiation is off the scale, spawning all kinds of abominations, and the sector itself is slowly but surely turning into nothing..."
languages.original_text: "И место неприятное. Это основание шпиля, на котором мы обитаем. Комморра сшита из лоскутов разных измерений, и в том месте эти лоскуты начали рваться. Пространство коллапсирует, энтропийная радиация зашкаливает, плодятся всякие чудовища, а сам сектор потихоньку обращается в ничто..."

Commorragh is stitched together from scraps of various dimensions, and in the Mangled Sector, the seams are starting to rip. Space is collapsing in on itself and entropic radiation is off the scale, spawning all kinds of abominations, and the sector itself is slowly but surely turning into nothing..."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “因为那里确实就是个让人倒胃口的地方，我们所在尖塔的地基就在那里。科摩罗由无数维度的碎片拼接而成，而崩落区的缝隙正在不断撕裂。空间开始自我坍塌，熵辐射超标，无数要命的怪物涌了出来。这个区域本身的崩塌速度虽然很慢，但终将化为一片虚无……”
languages.original_text: "It's an off-putting place. It's the base of the spire in which we live. Commorragh is stitched together from scraps of various dimensions, and in the Mangled Sector, the seams are starting to rip. Space is collapsing in on itself and entropic radiation is off the scale, spawning all kinds of abominations, and the sector itself is slowly but surely turning into nothing..."

traits.locale_text: “因为那里确实就是个让人倒胃口的地方，我们所在尖塔的地基就在那里。科摩罗由无数维度的碎片拼接而成，而崩落区的缝隙正在不断撕裂。空间开始自我坍塌，熵辐射超标，无数要命的怪物涌了出来。这个区域本身的崩塌速度虽然很慢，但终将化为一片虚无……”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «Es un lugar preocupante. Es la base de la torre donde vivimos. Commorragh es un amasijo de retazos de otras dimensiones y, en el Sector Destrozado, se están descosiendo. El espacio se colapsa sobre sí mismo y la radiación entrópica excede cualquier escala, dando lugar a abominaciones de toda clase. El propio sector se está desintegrando de forma lenta pero inexorable...».
languages.original_text: "It's an off-putting place. It's the base of the spire in which we live. Commorragh is stitched together from scraps of various dimensions, and in the Mangled Sector, the seams are starting to rip. Space is collapsing in on itself and entropic radiation is off the scale, spawning all kinds of abominations, and the sector itself is slowly but surely turning into nothing..."

traits.locale_text: «Es un lugar preocupante. Es la base de la torre donde vivimos. Commorragh es un amasijo de retazos de otras dimensiones y, en el Sector Destrozado, se están descosiendo. El espacio se colapsa sobre sí mismo y la radiación entrópica excede cualquier escala, dando lugar a abominaciones de toda clase. El propio sector se está desintegrando de forma lenta pero inexorable...».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「反吐が出るような場所だ。俺らが住んでいる尖塔の土台として機能している。コモラフはさまざまな次元の断片をつなぎ合わせているが、“切り裂かれた星域”のつなぎ目が裂け始めている。宇宙は内側に崩壊し、エントロピー放射線の量は跳ね上がり、あらゆる忌まわしい生物を生み出していて、星域そのものが徐々に、しかし確実に無になりつつある…」
languages.original_text: "It's an off-putting place. It's the base of the spire in which we live. Commorragh is stitched together from scraps of various dimensions, and in the Mangled Sector, the seams are starting to rip. Space is collapsing in on itself and entropic radiation is off the scale, spawning all kinds of abominations, and the sector itself is slowly but surely turning into nothing..."

traits.locale_text: 「反吐が出るような場所だ。俺らが住んでいる尖塔の土台として機能している。コモラフはさまざまな次元の断片をつなぎ合わせているが、“切り裂かれた星域”のつなぎ目が裂け始めている。宇宙は内側に崩壊し、エントロピー放射線の量は跳ね上がり、あらゆる忌まわしい生物を生み出していて、星域そのものが徐々に、しかし確実に無になりつつある…」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Es ist ein abschreckender Ort. Die Basis des Turms, in dem wir leben. Commorragh ist aus Fetzen verschiedener Dimensionen zusamengestückelt, und im Zerfleischten Sektor fangen die Nähte an zu reißen. Der Raum kollabiert und die entropische Strahlung sprengt jede Skala. Das bringt allerlei Missgeburten hervor, und der Sektor selbst verkommt langsam aber sicher zu einem großen Nichts ..."
languages.original_text: "It's an off-putting place. It's the base of the spire in which we live. Commorragh is stitched together from scraps of various dimensions, and in the Mangled Sector, the seams are starting to rip. Space is collapsing in on itself and entropic radiation is off the scale, spawning all kinds of abominations, and the sector itself is slowly but surely turning into nothing..."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist ein abschreckender Ort. Die Basis des Turms, in dem wir leben. Commorragh ist aus Fetzen verschiedener Dimensionen zusamengestückelt, und im Zerfleischten Sektor fangen die Nähte an zu reißen. Der Raum kollabiert und die entropische Strahlung sprengt jede Skala. Das bringt allerlei Missgeburten hervor, und der Sektor selbst verkommt langsam aber sicher zu einem großen Nichts ..."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « Mais il décrit bien les lieux. Il s'agit de la base de la tour dans laquelle nous vivons. Commorragh est un assemblage de morceaux de différentes dimensions, et dans le Secteur condamné, les jointures commencent à céder. L'espace s'effondre sur lui-même et les radiations entropiques ont atteint un niveau faramineux, ce qui fait apparaître toutes sortes d'abominations. Le secteur se désintègre lentement, mais sûrement... »
languages.original_text: "It's an off-putting place. It's the base of the spire in which we live. Commorragh is stitched together from scraps of various dimensions, and in the Mangled Sector, the seams are starting to rip. Space is collapsing in on itself and entropic radiation is off the scale, spawning all kinds of abominations, and the sector itself is slowly but surely turning into nothing..."

traits.locale_text: « Mais il décrit bien les lieux. Il s'agit de la base de la tour dans laquelle nous vivons. Commorragh est un assemblage de morceaux de différentes dimensions, et dans le Secteur condamné, les jointures commencent à céder. L'espace s'effondre sur lui-même et les radiations entropiques ont atteint un niveau faramineux, ce qui fait apparaître toutes sortes d'abominations. Le secteur se désintègre lentement, mais sûrement... »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "İtici bir yer de ondan. Yaşadığımız bu kulenin zemini olur. Commorragh, farklı boyutlardan parçaların bir araya tutturulmasıyla oluşmuş bir yerdir. Biçimsiz Sektör'de dikişler atmaya başladı. Uzay kendi içine göçüyor, entropik ışınım seviyeleri uçtu gidiyor. Sonuç olarak da türlü garabetler ortaya çıkıyor. Sektör, yavaş yavaş hiçliğe teslim oluyor..."
languages.original_text: "It's an off-putting place. It's the base of the spire in which we live. Commorragh is stitched together from scraps of various dimensions, and in the Mangled Sector, the seams are starting to rip. Space is collapsing in on itself and entropic radiation is off the scale, spawning all kinds of abominations, and the sector itself is slowly but surely turning into nothing..."

traits.locale_text: "İtici bir yer de ondan. Yaşadığımız bu kulenin zemini olur. Commorragh, farklı boyutlardan parçaların bir araya tutturulmasıyla oluşmuş bir yerdir. Biçimsiz Sektör'deyse dikişler atmaya başlıyor. Uzay kendi içine göçüyor, entropik ışınım seviyeleri uçtu gidiyor. Bundan da türlü garabetler ortaya çıkıyor. Sektör, yavaş yavaş hiçliğe teslim oluyor..."
traits.speaker: Anger
